title: (x) Two rather contemporary serif fonts: Who knows these? - Fournier, Whitman {Reed R}
content:
Hello!

I ran across these two serif fonts which pleased my eye. Does anyone know their names? They do not seem to be Linotype or Adobe. Thank you very much in advance for any information on these "wanted" fellows.

Gunnar

Font 1:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803220146im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font1_5694.jpg)

Font 2:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803220146im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font2_4107.jpg)
author: Gunnar

comments.content: The top sample is [Fournier](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803220146/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/fournier-mt/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D240%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3Dfilm%2520screenings.%2520The%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cext%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D25) (one of my favorites!), and the bottom is [Whitman](http://web.archive.org/).
